name: Over Speeding
description: Driving above the prescribed speed limit depending on vehicle category and road type.
typicalExamples: Driving at 80 km/h in a 50 km/h zone
Exceeding speed limit in a school zone

name: Drunken Driving
description: Driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
typicalExamples: Driver’s blood-alcohol content above legal limit

name: No Seat Belt
description: Failure to wear a seat belt while driving or sitting in the front seat.

name: Using Mobile While Driving
description: Using a mobile phone or other handheld device while operating a vehicle.
typicalExamples: Holding a phone to take a call while moving

name: Signal Jumping
description: Disobeying traffic lights or signals while driving.

name: No Helmet
description: Riding a two-wheeler without wearing a protective helmet.
typicalExamples: Rider of a bike without helmet

name: Driving Without Licence
description: Driving a motor vehicle without holding a valid driving licence issued by the competent authority.
typicalExamples: Driving without ever obtaining a licence

name: Driving Without Insurance
description: Using a motor vehicle in a public place without valid motor insurance coverage.

name: Overloading Passengers
description: Carrying more passengers than the permitted seating capacity of the vehicle.

name: Driving Without Registration
description: Driving a vehicle that is not registered with the Regional Transport Office.
typicalExamples: Using an unregistered vehicle on road

name: Dangerous Driving
description: Driving in a manner that endangers public safety, including rash or negligent driving.

name: Blocking Emergency Vehicles
description: Failing to give way to ambulances, fire engines, or other emergency vehicles.

name: Pollution Certificate Not Available
description: Driving a vehicle without a valid Pollution Under Control certificate.

name: Unauthorized Parking
description: Parking a vehicle in prohibited or no-parking zones causing obstruction.
typicalExamples: Parking in front of gate or driveway

name: Failure to Carry Documents
description: Failure to produce valid driving licence, RC, insurance, or PUC when demanded by authorities.
typicalExamples: Not carrying licence or digital copy
Unable to show RC or insurance

name: Driving Against One Way
description: Driving a vehicle in the opposite direction on a one-way road, creating risk to other road users.
typicalExamples: Entering a one-way street from the wrong side
Taking a shortcut through a one-way road

name: Honking in Silent Zone
description: Using the horn in designated silent zones such as hospitals, courts, and schools.

name: Racing or Speed Testing on Public Road
description: Conducting races or speed trials on public roads without permission.
typicalExamples: Testing vehicle top speed on highway

name: Using Black Film or Tinted Glass
description: Using tinted or black films beyond the legally permitted visibility limits.
typicalExamples: Dark sun film on car windows

name: Number Plate Not as Per Norms
description: Using fancy, damaged, altered, or non-standard number plates.

name: Improper Use of High Beam
description: Using high beam lights in city areas or when approaching another vehicle.

name: Carrying Goods in Passenger Vehicle
description: Transporting commercial goods in a vehicle not permitted for goods carriage.
typicalExamples: Using personal car for commercial delivery

name: Obstructing Traffic
description: Stopping or leaving a vehicle in a way that obstructs free flow of traffic.
typicalExamples: Stopping vehicle in middle of road

name: Allowing Unauthorized Person to Drive
description: Allowing a person without a valid licence to drive your vehicle.

name: Failure to Stop After Accident
description: Not stopping or reporting after being involved in a road accident.
typicalExamples: Hit and run without informing police

name: Driving Without Valid Fitness Certificate
description: Using a transport or old vehicle on public roads without a valid fitness certificate issued by the authority.
typicalExamples: Expired fitness certificate for commercial vehicle
Old vehicle running without fitness clearance

name: Using Modified or Loud Exhaust
description: Using modified silencers or exhaust systems that produce excessive noise beyond permitted limits.
typicalExamples: Excessive exhaust noise in residential area

name: Not Giving Way to Pedestrians
description: Failure to stop or slow down to allow pedestrians to cross at zebra crossings or designated areas.
typicalExamples: Not stopping for pedestrians at crossing
